Palettes

Source: R/palettes.R
sig_palette_doublet_type.Rd

Colour palettes for common signature types

Usage

sig_palette_doublet_type()

Details

Palettes are consistent with COSMIC signature database (https://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/signatures/)

Examples

sig_palette_snv_type()
#>       C>A       C>G       C>T       T>A       T>C       T>G 
#> "#16AFE9"   "black" "#D9111E" "#C1BDBE" "#92C446" "#E6B8B9" 
sig_palette_doublet_type()
#>     AC>NN     AT>NN     CC>NN     CG>NN     CT>NN     GC>NN     TA>NN     TC>NN 
#> "#03BDEE" "#0266CC" "#A3CD61" "#016500" "#FE9798" "#E42A24" "#FEAF64" "#FC8002" 
#>     TG>NN     TT>NN 
#> "#CA99FB" "#4B029A" 
sig_palette_indel_type()
#>   1:Del:C   1:Del:T   1:Ins:C   1:Ins:T   2:Del:R   3:Del:R   4:Del:R   5:Del:R 
#> "#FAB15B" "#FA6A0C" "#A1D670" "#2F9024" "#F7BCA5" "#F97356" "#E72D28" "#AC0016" 
#>   2:Ins:R   3:Ins:R   4:Ins:R   5:Ins:R   2:Del:M   3:Del:M   4:Del:M   5:Del:M 
#> "#C6D9EC" "#83B6DA" "#3D81BB" "#164C9A" "#DBD9E2" "#A6A3CF" "#716DAD" "#4E2C84"
